trans-unit.source: Defines a mechanism for retrieving a service object; that is, an object that provides custom support to other objects.
trans-unit.target: 定义用于检索服务对象的机制；也即，向其他对象提供自定义支持的对象。

trans-unit.source: This interface is implemented by a class or value type that provides a service to other objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供了对其他对象的服务的类或值类型实现此接口。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> method of this interface obtains the object that provides the service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A>此接口的方法获取提供服务的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IServiceProvider> interface is implemented by a number of types, including <xref:System.Web.HttpContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IServiceProvider>接口由许多类型，包括实现<xref:System.Web.HttpContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它指定要获取的服务对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定类型的服务对象。

trans-unit.source: A service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
<see langword="null" /> if there is no service object of type <paramref name="serviceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 <paramref name="serviceType" /> 类型的服务对象，则为 <see langword="null" />。
